# ForMark
python开发工具整理：https://www.handsomemark.com/


# 部署流程

```
python setup.py sdist 
twine upload dist/ForMark-1.1.26.tar.gz


pip3 uninstall ForMark==1.1.21
pip3 install ForMark==1.1.25 -i https://pypi.python.org/simple

```

https://pypi.org/project/ForMark/

# 文献
